StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPointOfContactForSchool]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode int, @FiscalYear int
AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN --ContactName is a generalize name for any person or place SELECT poc.[PointOfContactID]
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] poc INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].CampusContact cc ON cc.PointOfContactID = poc.PointOfContactID INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].CollegePro.le cp ON cc.CollegePro.leID = cp.CollegePro.leID WHERE SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode and FiscalYear = @FiscalYear
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
